segments.text: This kitchen scene catches my eye immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on the plate, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, pooling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sloppy mess, it's disgusting how it's just spilling out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, and she doesn't even care or notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby might get ruined too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, the boy's climbing for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's unstable, but he's determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's right there, ready to grab her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies is fun, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that water's gross, could cause a bad slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the tidy garden outside is stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's stopping this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so avoidable yet happening anyway.
segments.speaker: PAR
